alfredsnippet.snippet:
Arthur Lynch, The Case Against Einstein, Dodd, Mead & Co., New York, 1933

"... let us clear our minds of cant, recognise what 'balderdash' is the current admiration of Einstein, even though heralded by Lord Haldane and trumpeted by Bernard Shaw."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - On the Admiration of Einstein
